law.text: The General Assembly finds that a major convention center in Northern Kentucky will serve as a catalyst in the regional development of commerce, and that it will enhance the position of Northern Kentucky as a year round convention and tourist attraction. The General Assembly finds further that the development and governance of a Northern Kentucky convention center is a public purpose of the Commonwealth.
law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992.
